addon_accessControl.name: Access Control Testing
addon_accessControl.description: Adds a set of tools for testing access control in web applications.
addon_accessControl.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_alertFilters.name: Alert Filters
addon_alertFilters.description: Allows you to automate the changing of alert risk levels.
addon_alertFilters.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_alertFilters.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • When the automation Job is edited via UI Dialog then the status will be set to Not started
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Include the ID when listing scan rules, to allow to differentiate scan rules with the same name (Issue 5699).

addon_allinonenotes.name: All In One Notes
addon_allinonenotes.description: A simple extension to view all notes in one pane.
addon_allinonenotes.author: David Vassallo
addon_allinonenotes.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Update link to repository.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_amf.name: AMF Support
addon_amf.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_amf.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_ascanrules.name: Active scanner rules
addon_ascanrules.description: The release status Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrules.changes:
Changed

  • The Directory Browsing scan rule now includes example alert functionality for documentation generation purposes (Issue 6119).
  • Use lower case HTTP field names for compatibility with HTTP/2.
  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • False positive in case of javascript: protocol xss attacks, when attack payload is modified by the application (Issue 6013).
  • Preserve the HTTP version in the scan rules:
    • Remote Code Execution - CVE-2012-1823
    • Source Code Disclosure - CVE-2012-1823
    • Source Code Disclosure - /WEB-INF folder

Added

  • The Hidden File Finder scan rule will now also check for "/_wpeprivate/config.json".

addon_ascanrulesAlpha.name: Active scanner rules (alpha)
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.description: The alpha status Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.changes:
Added

  • LDAP protocol technology support.

Fixed

  • Preserve the HTTP version in Web Cache Deception scan rule.

Added

  • Server Side Request Forgery Scan Rule.

addon_ascanrulesBeta.name: Active scanner rules (beta)
addon_ascanrulesBeta.description: The beta status Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrulesBeta.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrulesBeta.changes:
Changed

  • Use lower case HTTP field names for compatibility with HTTP/2.

Fixed

  • Preserve the HTTP version in the scan rules:
    • Backup File Disclosure
    • Bypassing 403
    • Cross-Domain Misconfiguration
    • Relative Path Confusion
    • Source Code Disclosure - Git
    • Source Code Disclosure - SVN
    • Possible Username Enumeration

addon_attacksurfacedetector.name: Attack Surface Detector
addon_attacksurfacedetector.description: The Attack Surface Detector analyzes web application source code to generate endpoints that can be used for penetration testing.
addon_attacksurfacedetector.author: Secure Decisions (Matthew DeLetto)
addon_attacksurfacedetector.changes:
Various incremental changes (see https://github.com/secdec/attack-surface-detector-zap/releases)
Fix un-handled exception when target unavailable & address various "house keeping" tasks.

addon_authstats.name: Authentication Statistics
addon_authstats.description: Records logged in/out statistics for all contexts in scope.
addon_authstats.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_authstats.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Dynamically unload the add-on.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_automation.name: Automation Framework
addon_automation.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_automation.changes:
Added

  • Allow to specify the HTTP version for requests in the requestor job.
  • Support for context technology (Issue 7127).

Changed

  • Maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Prevent exception if no display.

addon_beanshell.name: BeanShell Console
addon_beanshell.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_beanshell.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Improve permissions and space handling when saving.

addon_browserView.name: Browser View
addon_browserView.description: Adds an option to render HTML responses like a browser
addon_browserView.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_browserView.changes: Allow to properly scroll the rendered page.

addon_bruteforce.name: Forced Browse
addon_bruteforce.description: Forced browsing of files and directories using code from the OWASP DirBuster tool
addon_bruteforce.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_bugtracker.name: Bug Tracker
addon_bugtracker.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_bugtracker.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.
  • Dependency updates.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Updated to use PAT not password (https://github.blog/changelog/2021-08-12-git-password-authentication-is-shutting-down/).

addon_callgraph.name: Call Graph
addon_callgraph.description: Allows the user to view a call graph of the selected resources
addon_callgraph.author: Colm O'Flaherty
addon_callgraph.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_callhome.name: Call Home
addon_callhome.description: Handles all of the calls to ZAP services.
addon_callhome.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_codedx.name: Code Dx Extension
addon_codedx.description: Includes request and response data in XML reports and provides the ability to upload reports directly to a Code Dx server
addon_codedx.author: Code Dx, Inc.
addon_codedx.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Change to no longer rely on core report classes, which are going to be deleted.

addon_commonlib.name: Common Library
addon_commonlib.description: A common library, for use by other add-ons.
addon_commonlib.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_communityScripts.name: Community Scripts
addon_communityScripts.description: Useful ZAP scripts written by the ZAP community.
addon_communityScripts.author: ZAP Community
addon_communityScripts.changes:
Added

  • active/RCE.py
  • active/SSTI.py
  • active/SSTI.js - An active scan script to check for SSTI in 14 different template engines.
  • httpfuzzerprocessor/addCacheBusting.js - Fuzzing with cache busting.
  • encode-decode
    • README.md - Summary of the script type.
    • double-spacer.js - A script that inserts a space after every character in a string.
  • standalone/SecurityCrawlMazeScore.js
  • scan-hooks/LogMessagesHook.py and httpsender/LogMessages.js to help debugging, especially in docker.

Changed

  • standalone/enableDebugLogging.js > Updated for more recent logging funtionality.
  • Update JS scripts to use passed singleton variables (control, model, view) if available (>= ZAP 2.12.0).
  • passive/Server Header Disclosure.js > Updated to check that the Server Header contains something that looks like a semantic version component.

addon_coreLang.name: Core Language Files
addon_coreLang.description: Translations of the core language files
addon_coreLang.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_coreLang.changes:
Changed

  • Update the languages files from Crowdin.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.

addon_custompayloads.name: Custom Payloads
addon_custompayloads.description: Ability to add, edit or remove payloads that are used i.e. by active scanners
addon_custompayloads.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_custompayloads.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.
  • Add help content linking to the Scan Rules which support Custom Payloads.

addon_database.name: Database
addon_database.description: Provides database engines and related infrastructure.
addon_database.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_database.changes:
Added

  • Provides the SQLite database engine for other add-ons to use.
  • Support for the ZAP permanent database.

addon_diff.name: Diff
addon_diff.description: Displays a dialog showing the differences between 2 requests or responses. It uses diffutils and diff_match_patch
addon_diff.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_directorylistv1.name: Directory List v1.0
addon_directorylistv1.description: List of directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.
addon_directorylistv1.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_directorylistv2_3.name: Directory List v2.3
addon_directorylistv2_3.description: Lists of directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.
addon_directorylistv2_3.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_directorylistv2_3.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.name: Directory List v2.3 LC
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.description: Lists of lower case directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_domxss.name: DOM XSS Active scanner rule
addon_domxss.author: Aabha Biyani, ZAP Dev Team
addon_domxss.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Promoted to Release status.

addon_encoder.name: Encoder
addon_encoder.description: Adds encode/decode/hash dialog and support for scripted processors as well
addon_encoder.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_encoder.changes:
BREAKING CHANGE

  • Existing scripts will fail as the process method signature has changed, scripts can be fixed by changing the signature from: process(value) to process(helper, value).

Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Add-on promoted to Release status.
  • Allow script processors to return strings without requiring an "EncodeDecodeResult" wrapper.
  • Show help and options buttons in the main dialog.
  • The Base64 decoder now uses a Mime decoder and handles line wrapped input.
  • Updated script templates to use the new process method.

Added

  • Add an option which controls whether or not Hash output panels use full caps or lower case (Issue 7503).
  • Utility processors (not shown by default).
    • Lower case
    • Remove Whitespace
    • Reverse
    • Upper case

addon_evalvillain.name: Eval Villain
addon_evalvillain.description: Adds the Eval Villain extension to Firefox when launched from ZAP.
addon_evalvillain.author: Dennis Goodlett and the ZAP Dev Team
addon_evalvillain.changes:
Fixed

  • Fix the downloaded version of the Eval Villain Firefox extension.

addon_exim.name: Import/Export
addon_exim.author: ZAP Dev Team & thatsn0tmysite
addon_exim.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • When importing a file of URLs the output tab and log will now be more informative about failures.

Added

  • HAR related API endpoints being migrated from core (Issue 6579).

addon_fileupload.name: FileUpload
addon_fileupload.description: Detect File upload requests and scan them to find related vulnerabilities
addon_fileupload.author: KSASAN preetkaran20@gmail.com

addon_formhandler.name: Form Handler
addon_formhandler.description: This Form Handler Add-on allows a user to define field names and values to be used in a form's fields. Fields can be added, modified, enabled, and deleted for use in form fields.
addon_formhandler.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_formhandler.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • No longer provide the value generator through the core spider (Related to Issue 3113).
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_fuzzdb.name: FuzzDB Files
addon_fuzzdb.description: FuzzDB files which can be used with the ZAP fuzzer
addon_fuzzdb.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_fuzzdb.changes:
Changed

  • Updated RAFT lists based on more recent SecLists contributions
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.

addon_fuzzdboffensive.name: FuzzDB Offensive
addon_fuzzdboffensive.description: FuzzDB web backdoors and attack files which can be used with the ZAP fuzzer or for manual penetration testing
addon_fuzzdboffensive.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_gettingStarted.name: Getting Started with ZAP Guide
addon_gettingStarted.description: A short Getting Started with ZAP Guide
addon_gettingStarted.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_gettingStarted.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Added note about Firefox's Enhanced Tracking Protection.

addon_graaljs.name: GraalVM JavaScript
addon_graaljs.description: Provides the GraalVM JavaScript engine for ZAP scripting.
addon_graaljs.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_graaljs.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.

Fixed

  • Declare the engine is single threaded (Issue 6992).

addon_graphql.name: GraphQL Support
addon_graphql.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_graphql.changes:
Changed

  • The GraphQL Support Script has been superseded by a variant.
  • Argument names will now be used to get values from the form handler add-on, instead of argument types.
  • Dependency updates and maintenance changes.

Fixed

  • Introspection was not working for some applications (Issue 7602).
  • Variables in JSON queries were being added incorrectly.
  • Attack payloads were being injected outside the quotes of inline string arguments.

addon_groovy.name: Groovy Support
addon_groovy.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_groovy.changes:
Added

  • encode-decode default template.

Changed

  • Update links to zaproxy and zap-extensions repos.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

Added

Changed

addon_jwt.description: Detect JWT requests and scan them to find related vulnerabilities
addon_jwt.author: KSASAN preetkaran20@gmail.com
addon_jwt.changes:
• First version of JWT Support.
    • Contains scanning rules for basic JWT related vulnerabilities.
    • Contains JWT Fuzzer for fuzzing the JWT's present in the request.

addon_jython.name: Python Scripting
addon_jython.description: Allows Python to be used for ZAP scripting - templates included

Added

  • encode-decode default and rot13 templates.

Changed

  • Update links to zaproxy repo.
  • Rename reliability to confidence in active/passive templates.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_kotlin.description: Allows Kotlin to be used for ZAP scripting
addon_kotlin.author: StackHawk Engineering
addon_kotlin.changes:
Changed

  • Use appropriate syntax style for highlighting of code.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_levoai.name: Levo.ai
addon_levoai.description: Build OpenAPI Specs with ZAP traffic using Levo.ai.
addon_levoai.author: Levo.ai

addon_neonmarker.name: Neonmarker
addon_neonmarker.description: Colors history table items based on tags
addon_neonmarker.author: Juha Kiveks, Kingthorin
addon_neonmarker.changes:
Added

  • A right-click context menu is now available in the History tab in order to Select/Set a color for arbitrary messages.

addon_network.name: Network
addon_network.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_network.changes:
Fixed

  • Fix authentication with TRACE requests and HTTP/NTLM reauthentication to proxy (Issue 7566).

addon_oast.name: OAST Support
addon_oast.description: Allows you to exploit out-of-band vulnerabilities
addon_oast.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_oast.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Do not include the Connection header in Callback responses for HTTP/2.

Added

  • Allow getting both the payload and canary values for OAST services.

Fixed

  • Interactsh canary values were reversed in the UI.

addon_openapi.name: OpenAPI Support
addon_openapi.author: ZAP Dev Team plus Joanna Bona, Nathalie Bouchahine, Artur Grzesica, Mohammad Kamar, Markus Kiss, Michal Materniak, Marcin Spiewak, and SDA SE Open Industry Solutions
addon_openapi.changes:
Changed

  • Dependency updates.
  • Each imported endpoint is included in the selected context, unless its URL matches an already existing Include in Context regex entry.

addon_packpentester.name: Collection: Pentester Pack
addon_packpentester.description: A collection of add-ons ideal for pentesters

addon_packscanrules.name: Collection: Scan Rules Pack

addon_paramdigger.name: Parameter Digger
addon_paramdigger.description: Identify hidden, unlinked parameters. Useful for finding web cache poisoning vulnerabilities.
addon_paramdigger.author: ZAP Dev Team and Arkaprabha Chakraborty
addon_paramdigger.changes:
Changed

  • Rename multiple options in GUI and documentation.

addon_plugnhack.name: Plug-n-Hack Configuration
addon_plugnhack.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_plugnhack.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Use Network add-on to obtain main proxy address/port.

addon_portscan.name: Port Scanner
addon_portscan.description: Allows to port scan a target server
addon_portscan.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_portscan.changes:
Changed

  • Use the Network add-on to obtain the outgoing proxy.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.

addon_pscanrules.name: Passive scanner rules
addon_pscanrules.description: The release status Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrules.changes:
Added

  • The following scan rules were added, having been promoted from Beta:
    • Big Redirects
    • Directory Browsing
    • Hash Disclosure
    • HeartBleed
    • Insecure Form Load
    • Insecure Form Post
    • Link Target
    • Modern App Detection
    • PII
    • Retrieved From Cache
    • Server Header Info Leak
    • Strict Transport Security
    • User Controlled Charset
    • User Controlled Cookie
    • User Controlled HTML Attributes
    • User Controlled Javascript Event
    • User Controlled Open Redirect
    • X-Backend-Server Information Leak
    • X-ChromeLogger-Data Info Leak

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • The Server Header Information Leak scan rule now has functionality to generate example alerts for documentation purposes (Issue 6119).
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_pscanrulesAlpha.name: Passive scanner rules (alpha)
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.description: The alpha status Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.changes:

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.

Removed

  • The following scan rules were removed, having been promoted to Beta:
    • Content Cacheable
    • In Page Banner Info Leak
    • JS Function
    • JSO
    • Permissions Policy
    • Sub Resource Integrity Attribute

addon_pscanrulesBeta.name: Passive scanner rules (beta)
addon_pscanrulesBeta.description: The beta status Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrulesBeta.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrulesBeta.changes:
Added

  • The following scan rules were added, having been promoted from Alpha:
    • Content Cacheable
    • In Page Banner Info Leak
    • JS Function
    • JSO
    • Permissions Policy
    • Sub Resource Integrity Attribute

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Content Cacheability scan rule now has functionality to generate example alerts for documentation purposes (Issue 7502).

Removed

  • The following scan rules were removed, having been promoted to Release:
    • Big Redirects
    • Directory Browsing
    • Hash Disclosure
    • HeartBleed
    • Insecure Form Load
    • Insecure Form Post
    • Link Target
    • Modern App Detection
    • PII
    • Retrieved From Cache
    • Server Header Info Leak
    • Strict Transport Security
    • User Controlled Charset
    • User Controlled Cookie
    • User Controlled HTML Attributes
    • User Controlled Javascript Event
    • User Controlled Open Redirect
    • X-Backend-Server Information Leak
    • X-ChromeLogger-Data Info Leak

addon_quickstart.description: Provides a tab which allows you to quickly test a target application
addon_quickstart.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_quickstart.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Remove core spider usage (Related to Issue 3113).
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Record news stats.

addon_regextester.name: Regular Expression Tester
addon_regextester.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_regextester.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

Fixed

  • Close dialogues when the add-on is uninstalled.

addon_replacer.name: Replacer
addon_replacer.description: Easy way to replace strings in requests and responses.
addon_replacer.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_replacer.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.

Added

  • Allow the rules to apply to specific URLs (Issue 4793).

addon_reports.name: Report Generation
addon_reports.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_reports.changes:
Added

  • SARIF reporting

Changed

  • The XML and JSON reports now include programName metadata elements (Issue 6640).

addon_requester.name: Requester
addon_requester.description: Allows to manually edit and send messages.
addon_requester.author: Surikato and the ZAP Dev Team
addon_requester.changes:
Added

  • Add Send button to Response tab.
  • Add shortcut to Send buttons (Issue 6448).
  • Add button to allow to regenerate Anti-CSRF tokens (Issue 111).
  • Provide the necessary infrastructure for other add-ons (e.g. WebSocket) to send messages.
  • Manage the send/resend Manual Request Editor dialogues.
  • Add a Tools menu item to open the send Manual Request Editor.
  • Add a context menu item to open the resend Manual Request Editor.
  • Allow to establish WebSocket connections with the send/resend Manual Request Editor dialogues.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.
  • Improve reporting of TLS errors (Issue 2699).
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Promoted to Beta.
  • Now following Semantic Versioning.

addon_retest.name: Retest
addon_retest.description: An add-on to retest for presence/absence of previously generated alerts.
addon_retest.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_retest.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.12.0.

Fixed

  • Correct the Automation Framework plan generation with localized languages.

Changed

  • Issue 2000 - Updated strings shown in active scan dialog with title caps.

addon_soap.name: SOAP Support
addon_soap.description: Imports and scans WSDL files containing SOAP endpoints.
addon_soap.author: Alberto (albertov91) + ZAP Dev Team
addon_soap.changes:
Changed

  • The SOAP Support.js input vector script is removed when the add-on is uninstalled.
  • Dependency updates.

addon_spider.name: Spider
addon_spider.description: Spider used for automatically finding URIs on a site.
addon_spider.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_spider.changes:
Functional Improvements Compared to Previous Core Release

The following table illustrates the changes versus the previous core release(s) (2.11/2.11.1).

BeforeAfter
Base - Proper handlingBase - Proper handling
A, Link, Area - href attributeA, Link, Area - 'href' attribute
Frame, IFrame, Script, Img - src attributeApplet, Audio, Embed, Frame, IFrame, Input, Script, Img, Video - 'src' attribute
Meta - http-equiv for location and refreshMeta - 'http-equiv' for 'location', 'refresh' and 'Content-Security-Policy', 'name' for 'msapplication-config'
Applet - 'codebase', 'archive' attributes
Img - 'longdesc', 'lowsrc', 'dynsrc', 'srcset' attributes
Isindex - 'action' attribute
Object - 'codebase', 'data' attributes
Svg - 'href' and 'xlink:href' attributes of 'image' and 'script' elements
Table - 'background' attribute
Video - 'poster' attribute
Form - proper handling of Forms with both GET and POST method. The fields values are generated validly, including HTML 5.0 input types.Form - proper handling of Forms with both GET and POST method. The fields values are generated validly, including HTML 5.0 input types 'form', 'formaction', 'formmethod' attributes of buttons are also respected.
Comments - Valid tags found in comments are also analyzed, if specified in the Options Spider screenComments - Valid tags found in comments are also analyzed, if specified in the Options Spider screen
Import - 'implementation' attribute
Inline string - 'p', 'title', 'li', 'h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6', and 'blockquote' tags
SVG image files are parsed to identify HREF attributes and extract/resolve any contained links. (Issue 4984)
Irrelevant Parameters - Allows to manage the parameters that should be removed when canonicalising the URLs found. The session token names defined in the HTTP Sessions options are taken into account and removed (Issue 4388).
